channel.title: ggplot2 on Data Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in ggplot2 on Data Scientist

item.title: Make beautiful graphs with R
item.description: Greetings to yu my friend, today i would like to talk abouthow to make charts in R. We shall use the ggplot2 package which follows the rules of grammar of graphics. A grammar of graphics is a tool that enables us to concisely describe the components of a graphic. Such a grammar allows us to move beyond named graphics (e.g., the ``scatterplot’’) and gain insight into the deep structure that underlies statistical graphics
